data.text:
@_TallieRose Chair is sooooo hotttt
Makes you want to convert to chairsexuality
@_TallieRose The chair is a chair that transports you directly to hell. Alternatively, someone farted on it a lot, and now the chair is unspeakably hot.
@_TallieRose Definitely why I didn't bother ordering the second one just yet, but we'll see!
@_TallieRose my Goodreads review of it says "Makes absolutely no goddamn sense but the sex is good so four stars"
@candacecbryant It’s one of those books where you just gotta let the plot holes go and enjoy the ride. I’m not sure I’ll read the second one but it’s fun enough.

@_TallieRose I think I bought this the day it came out but haven't gotten around to reading it, but I have heard others saying the same thing (porn with the flavor of a plot). Which tbvh I'm kinda here for, but TBD lol.

Okay further into this book and whew, this is just porn with the flavor of a plot. The idea of a plot. It met a plot on a train once. The world building makes no sense but I’m probably going to finish it today.
Actually I know I’m delirious because every time I read the tag line my head plays the line from Buffy “you were myth-taken”
@meganf_laherty I didn’t even consider that angle and that makes it even funnier.
